items.content_html: A lightweight, customizable menu library for creating interactive user interfaces in userscripts. It provides a clean, modern design with support for various input types and keybinds.
items.title: FrozenProductions/Frost-UI: A lightweight, customizable menu library for creating interactive user interfaces in userscripts. It provides a clean, modern design with support for various input types and keybinds.

items.content_html: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Rocket and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.
items.title: ljt019/exhibit_manager: This application streamlines the management of exhibits in a science museum. The frontend is built using React and Tauri, providing a responsive and lightweight user interface. The backend server and database are developed with Rocket and Rustqlite in Rust, ensuring robust performance and reliability.

items.content_html: CodeGPT is a lightweight, browser-based tool that leverages the Gen AI API to provide optimized JavaScript solutions for your problem statements. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it offers a simple interface where users can input their Gen AI API key and problem descriptions to instantly receive efficient solutions.
items.title: anandku06/CodeGPT: CodeGPT is a lightweight, browser-based tool that leverages the Gen AI API to provide optimized JavaScript solutions for your problem statements. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it offers a simple interface where users can input their Gen AI API key and problem descriptions to instantly receive efficient solutions.

items.content_html: Mind Mapper is an intuitive and lightweight application for organizing your ideas and projects in the form of mind maps. Whether you're a student, professional, or creative, this tool helps you visualize your thoughts, structure your plans, and collaborate effectively.
items.title: 4D4J/Mind-Mapper: Mind Mapper is an intuitive and lightweight application for organizing your ideas and projects in the form of mind maps. Whether you're a student, professional, or creative, this tool helps you visualize your thoughts, structure your plans, and collaborate effectively.

items.content_html: Web Video Player is a lightweight and customizable app that allows you to easily display and control videos on your web page.
items.title: LucasLixo/Web-Video-Player: Web Video Player is a lightweight and customizable app that allows you to easily display and control videos on your web page.

items.content_html: lightweight browser extension that provides a real-time countdown to the end of the year, showing the remaining days, hours, minutes, and seconds. Stay on top of time as the year progresses with this simple yet effective tool.
items.title: firozkhan4/ChaseTheClock:  lightweight browser extension that provides a real-time countdown to the end of the year, showing the remaining days, hours, minutes, and seconds. Stay on top of time as the year progresses with this simple yet effective tool.

items.content_html: Welcome to my DSAlgo learning wesbite. Backend: Powered by Django REST Framework, ensuring a robust, scalable API. Frontend: Built with React, offering an interactive and modern user interface. Database: Uses SQLite, providing efficient and lightweight data management. NOTE :- Make sure to download all the necessary modules and packages

Frontend: Built with React, offering an interactive and modern user interface. Database: Uses SQLite, providing efficient and lightweight data management.  NOTE :- Make sure to download all the necessary modules and packages

items.content_html: A React / React Native client for BLEST (Batch-able, Lightweight, Encrypted State Transfer), an improved communication protocol for web APIs which leverages JSON, supports request batching by default, and provides a modern alternative to REST.
items.title: jhuntdev/blest-react: A React / React Native client for BLEST (Batch-able, Lightweight, Encrypted State Transfer), an improved communication protocol for web APIs which leverages JSON, supports request batching by default, and provides a modern alternative to REST.

items.content_html: AnyGridJS is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.
items.title: Gugulethu-Nyoni/anyGridJs: AnyGridJS is a Lightweight, feature-rich JS library for dynamic data tables with paginated, sortable, searchable, column joining, action handles & URL definition. The library works with Semantq JS framework and vanilla JS. AnyGrid is flexible, customizable, responsive & performant. Open-source & MIT licensed.

items.content_html: This is a template for creating easily software for Windows XP with NW.js 15.4 (Latest possible version of NWjs that can successfully start on XP, which isn't the publicly known - 14.7). And Sveltekit (because it's pretty lightweight, easy to prototype and use and doesn't take up a loo of drive memory).
items.title: RenOosuke/SvelteAndNWJSForWindowsXP: This is a template for creating easily software for Windows XP with NW.js 15.4 (Latest possible version of NWjs that can successfully start on XP, which isn't the publicly known - 14.7). And Sveltekit (because it's pretty lightweight, easy to prototype and use and doesn't take up a loo of drive memory).
